com.wordscounter.model

Class WordsCounterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wordscounter.model.WordsCounterService

  • public class WordsCounterService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the operations used by the main class WordsCounter
    Author:
    Arekku

      • WordsCounterService

        public WordsCounterService(int workingFilesNumber,
                           int workingFilesSize)
        Creates a WordsCounterService with the given values.
        Parameters:
        workingFilesNumber - the number of workings files to set.
        workingFilesSize - the size of the working files to set.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkingFilesNumber

        public int getWorkingFilesNumber()
        Getter
        Returns:
        the number of working files.

      • setWorkingFilesNumber

        public void setWorkingFilesNumber(int workingFilesNumber)
        Setter
        Parameters:
        workingFilesNumber - the number of working files. If workingFilesNumber is 0, it sets the default value.

      • getWorkingFilesSize

        public int getWorkingFilesSize()
        Getter
        Returns:
        the size of working files.

      • setWorkingFilesSize

        public void setWorkingFilesSize(int workingFilesSize)
        Setter
        Parameters:
        workingFilesSize - the size of working files. If workingFilesSize is 0, it sets the default value.

      • createWorkingFiles

        public void createWorkingFiles()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a set of working files and saves it on disc.

        Every working file is created with a combination of a number of random base files, depending on the file size defined.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem while trying to read or write a working file.

      • countWordsSingleThread

        public void countWordsSingleThread(FrequencyMap wordsMap,
                                   java.util.List<ExecutionData> executionDataList)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Counts the frequency of every word present in the set of working files and saves it in a map.

        It parses all the working files, 1 by 1, using a single thread for all of them.

        Parameters:
        wordsMap - the map that will store the frequency of every word.
        executionDataList - the list of executions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem while trying to read or write a working file.

      • countWordsMultithread

        public void countWordsMultithread(FrequencyMap wordsMap,
                                  java.util.List<ExecutionData> executionDataList)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Counts the frequency of every word present in the set of working files and saves it in a map.

        It parses all the working files, 1 by 1, using a new thread for every file.

        Parameters:
        wordsMap - the map that will store the frequency of every word.
        executionDataList - the list of executions.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem while trying to read or write a working file.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if one of the threads created by this method is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if one of the threads created by this method has an execution error.

      • printExecutionData

        public void printExecutionData(ExecutionData execData)
        Prints the content of a given ExecutionData object.
        Parameters:
        execData - the ExecutionData object to print.

      • printExecutionDataList

        public void printExecutionDataList(java.util.LinkedList<ExecutionData> executionDataList)
        Prints the content of all the ExecutionData objects of a given list.
        Parameters:
        executionDataList - the list of ExecutionData objects to print.

      • deleteWorkingFiles

        public void deleteWorkingFiles()
        Deletes the working files from the disc. It checks the suffix of the file names to identify the working files.

      • printExecutionDataInfo

        private void printExecutionDataInfo(ExecutionData execData)
        Prints the attribute values of a given ExecutionData object.
        Parameters:
        execData - the ExecutionData object to print.
